content.question: Which of the following graphs best displays population size over time of an <math alttext="r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-selected species that has just colonized a new habitat with abundant resources?

choices.label: The figure presents the graph of a curve. The horizontal axis is labeled
The figure presents the graph of a curve. The horizontal axis is labeled
The figure presents the graph of a curve. The horizontal axis is labeled
The figure presents a line graph. The horizontal axis is labeled

content.answer: The figure presents the graph of a curve. The horizontal axis is labeled

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
